task.title: How to make Grilled Steak and Eggs with Beer and Molasses
task.shortdesc: If you enjoy eating meat, then you are going to enjoy this breakfast recipe. It combines wholesome steak with eggs for a delicious treat that you can enjoy in the morning.

context.p: Ingredients for the steak and eggs:

step.cmd: Melt the butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat.
Add the onion and garlic and saute until softened for about 3 minutes.
Add the rest of the sauce ingridents and bring them to a boil.
Simmer the mixture until it is reduced to 2 cups. This should take approxiamately 30 minutes.
Season the steaks with salt and pepper and rub with oil.
Grill for 3 to 5 minutes per side for medium.
Let the steak rest for 10 minutes before slicing.
Place a cast-iron skillet on the grill; add butter, oil, or bacon drippings
Crack in eggs and season to taste. Cook until the edges are crisp, but the yolks are still runny. This will take approixmately 2-3 minutes.
